languages.text: "Встаньте. Ритуал пурификации завершен. Теперь же несите в себе Его свет и докажите делом свою преданность Императору. Ефрат-II ждет вас, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Ты чист, больше не сбивайся с пути".
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Встаньте. Ритуал пурификации завершен. Теперь же несите в себе Его свет и докажите делом свою преданность Императору. Ефрат-II ждет вас, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Get up. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Get up. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “站起来吧，净化仪式已经完成。好了，去吧，带着神皇的光辉前行，用你的行动证明你对祂的忠诚。欧夫拉茨二号星在等着你，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “站起来吧，净化仪式已经完成。好了，去吧，带着神皇的光辉前行，用你的行动证明你对祂的忠诚。欧夫拉茨二号星在等着你，{name}。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「起きろ。浄化の儀式が完了した。これからは主の光を心に持ち、前に進むのだ。そして、己の行動で皇帝への忠誠心を証明しろ。{name}、ユーフラテス・IIがお前を待っている」
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「起きろ。浄化の儀式が完了した。これからは主の光を心に持ち、前に進むのだ。そして、己の行動で皇帝への忠誠心を証明しろ。{name}、ユーフラテス・IIがお前を待っている」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Levante, la ceremonia de purificación ha terminado. Ahora salga y lleve Su luz dentro de usted, deje que sus acciones prueben su lealtad al Emperador. Eufrates II le espera, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Levántese, la ceremonia de purificación ha terminado. Ahora salga y lleve Su luz dentro de usted, deje que sus acciones prueben su lealtad al Emperador. Eufrates II le espera, {name}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Erhebt Euch. Der Ritus der Läuterung ist abgeschlossen. Nun zieht aus und tragt sein Licht in Euch, und lasst Euer Handeln den Beweis für Eure Loyalität dem Imperator gegenüber sein. Eufrates II erwartet Euch, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Erhebt Euch. Der Ritus der Läuterung ist abgeschlossen. Nun zieht aus und tragt sein Licht in Euch, und lasst Euer Handeln den Beweis für Eure Loyalität dem Imperator gegenüber sein. Eufrates II erwartet Euch, {name}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Levez-vous. Le rituel de purification est accompli. Marchez dans Sa lumière et prouvez par vos actions votre loyauté envers l'Empereur. Euphrate-II vous attend, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Levez-vous. Le rituel de purification est accompli. Marchez dans Sa lumière et prouvez par vos actions votre loyauté envers l'Empereur. Euphrate-II vous attend, {name}. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Kalk. Arınma ayini tamamlandı. Bundan böyle O'nun nurunu içinde taşıyacak, yaptıklarınla İmparator'a olan bağlılığını kanıtlayacaksın. {name}, Eufrates II seni bekler."
languages.original_text: "Rise. The rite of purification is complete. Now go forth and carry His light within you, and let your actions prove your loyalty to the Emperor. Eufrates II awaits you, {name}."
